document_data.name: Phuingara Lhoril
document_data.mainbody: '''Phuingara Lhoril''' was an inhabitant of [[Myth Drannor]] in the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: She was the lady of house [[Lhoril]].
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|241}}, she joined a party at [[Satyrdance Pool]], where she revealed that she feared for the continued existence of [[Cormanthor]]. Albeit she was ridiculed at first, her friend group eventually came around, and they agreed on some plan to steer their husbands towards keeping Cormanthor from complete destruction.
